title: AG Pam Bondi Announces Federal Investigation into Tesla Vandalism
summary: Attorney General Pam Bondi threatened Tesla vandals with severe federal charges, characterizing the property destruction as potential 'domestic terrorism'. The investigation targets coordinated attacks on Tesla vehicles and infrastructure across multiple states, with potential 20-year prison sentences for those involved.
description: Attorney General Pam Bondi opened a federal investigation into coordinated Tesla vandalism, vowing to pursue severe criminal charges against participants and expose potential funding sources.
